title: Sekai de Ichiban Tsuyoku Naritai!
original_name: 世界でいちばん強くなりたい!
opening_song: "Beautiful Dreamer (ビューティフル・ドリーマー)" by Kyoko Narumi (鳴海杏子)
ending_song: #1: "Fan Fanfare!!!" by Sweet Diva (Ayana Taketatsu, Kana Asumi, Yuka Ootsubo, Miku Itou, Sora Amamiya) (ep 1-7, 9-12)
sinopse: Hagiwara Sakura and Miyazawa Elena are the leading members of a popular idol group, Sweet Diva. One day, Elena is injured by the attack of a female pro-wrestler Kazama Rio during the recording of a TV program. Sakura gets mad at Rio and gives her a dropkick. To avenge Elena, Sakura enters the female pro-wrestling matches.
